channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: No Doubt Playing Sphere Residency In 2026
item.description: 🌟 No doubt about it! #NoDoubt is bringing their iconic tunes to The Sphere in 2026! Who's ready to rock?! 🎶🎉 #MusicNews

item.title: Dua Lipa Brings Out Gwen Stefani to Duet No Doubt’s “Don’t Speak”: Watch
item.description: 🎤 Iconic collab alert! Dua Lipa x Gwen Stefani singing "Don't Speak" is pure magic! Watch now! 🔥 #MusicLegends #DuaLipa #GwenStefani

item.title: Yungblud Sells Out 2026 North American Tour in One Minute
item.description: Yungblud is bringing the heat! 🔥 Tickets for his 2026 North American tour sold out in just ONE minute! 🎸🎉 #Yungblud #SoldOutSuccess

item.title: Madonna Shares Previously Unreleased ’90s Demo “Right On Time” From New Bedtime Stories – The Untold Chapter EP
item.description: 🌟 Travel back to the '90s with Madonna's unreleased gem "Right On Time" from Bedtime Stories – The Untold Chapter EP! 🎶 #Madonna #NewMusicDiscovery

item.title: Portugal. The Man add intimate shows to fall tour
item.description: 🎉 Snag your tickets now for @portugaltheman's cozy fall gigs! 🎶✨ Limited seats, unlimited good vibes. #LiveMusic #PortugalTheMan
